entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -22.8°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Mainly Sunny

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
